Key Match Events: Desmond Bane made a game-tying shot from well beyond the three-point line, but it was waved off due to a timeout called by coach Taylor Jenkins before the release
Post-Match Reflections: Grizzlies head coach Taylor Jenkins spoke on his decision to bench Ja Morant for a good chunk of the fourth quarter in a tight game
Jenkins admitted his costly mistake after the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ja Morant scored 27 points but struggled to find his shot in the final period
The Grizzlies lost to the Houston Rockets 119-115
Others: The Grizzlies now move on to face the Minnesota Timberwolves before traveling to take on the Houston Rockets for the second time in five days
